Game Name : Black Guard
Name : Blackguards
Genre: Role -playing (RPG) games
Game production : Daedalic Entertainment
Game publishers : Daedalic Entertainment
Platform: PC
Release date : November 19, 2013
Official Website : http://www.blackguards-game.com/


Game description

       Daedalic Entertainment recently announced that they produce turn-based PRG " Black Guard" will be landing PC and MAC 11 19, will provide over 40 hours of gaming experience , but also released two screenshots . Compared Daedalic previous works , the story of the game is relatively dark , players will play a rave in Aventuria murderers walk through the south . Protagonists met in a variety of partners in the journey : Half Elf thief and a liar Niam there lecherous sorcerer Zurbaran.

" Black Guard" includes a number of deadly biological and other types of enemies , as well as over 170 different styles of maps.

      In the " Black Guard" , the player plays a convicted murderer , with the help of a group of his teammates , to redeem , to save the world is facing the threat of darkness .



Configuration Requirements

Minimum:

OS: Windows XP 32 Bit
Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600 / GT, ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 20 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
Additional Notes: Using the Minimum Configuration, we strongly recommend to use minimal settings in order to not experience low framerate Please also note that the minimum and recommended settings could evolve during the game development..

Recommended:

OS: Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 (32/64 bits versions)
Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core CPU
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 275, ATI Radeon 4770 Series or higher
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 20 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
Additional Notes: Please note that the minimum and recommended settings could evolve during the game development.
